name: Unity.Run()
description:
[Unity-chan]'s running game has been made!
Unity-chan will run! and hop! and slide! by simple operations.

The modes EASY/NORMAL/HARD will be unlocked one by one as you clear stages in first place.
Aim for the ultimate highest score at the INFINITE / INFINITE-2 mode, which will be unlocked at the very end!
By pushing the boost button, you can increase your speed and scores!

The song that Unity-chan sings "UNITE IN THE SKY" has been added to the BGM!
Other BGM material : Maou damashii
